description.en:
While out to get his sister’s favorite snack, Baekhyeon finds himself and the people around him suddenly shrinking... to the size of ants! Now, everything from cats to robotic vacuums pose a threat to human survival. Within this chaos, everyone is given a gift -- a unique superpower and interface that lets them see data about themselves. Though it’s become a dark and desperate world, Baekhyeon must put his ability and wits to the test to make it out alive and save his sister.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/3cmlieshou/list?title_no=1497)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://webtoons.com/es/action/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=2349)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://webtoons.com/id/fantasy/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=1782)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001509)
description.es:
Baekhyeon está comprando algo de comer para su hermana cuando, de repente... ¿todo a su alrededor se agranda? No, en realidad, son los seres humanos los que se encogieron: ahora miden solo 3 cm. En este caos, hasta los gatos y las aspiradoras se convierten en una amenaza mortal, y los humanos deberán valerse de sus nuevas habilidades especiales para prevalecer. El mundo se ha vuelto un lugar oscuro y peligroso, pero Baekhyeon hará todo lo posible para sobrevivir y proteger a su hermana menor y sus amigos.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/3cmlieshou/list?title_no=1497)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://webtoons.com/es/action/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=2349)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://webtoons.com/id/fantasy/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=1782)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001509)
description.fa:
در یک روز عادی ناگهان مردم تا ۳ سانتی‌متر کوچک شدند…؟! به دنبال تاثیرات این واقعه تمامی چیز‌هایی که یک انسان در زندگی روزمره زیر پا له می‌کرد حال تهدیدی جدی محسوب میشه. موش‌های خیابانی، حیوانات خانگی، پرندگان و‌… حتی مورچه‌ها. و این تمام ماجرا نیست! تمامی این اتفاقات پیش از این در یک ناول نوشته شده بوده…!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/3cmlieshou/list?title_no=1497)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://webtoons.com/es/action/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=2349)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://webtoons.com/id/fantasy/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=1782)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001509)
description.id:
Semua orang di dunia mendadak menciut menjadi 3cm..?! Dari tikus....sampai eskalator... Sekarang semuanya dari kehidupan kita menjadi ancaman. Apakah Baekhyun bisa menyelesaikan misinya dan menyelamatkan dunia ini dengan menuggunakan kemampuan yang ia dapatkan?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/3cmlieshou/list?title_no=1497)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://webtoons.com/es/action/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=2349)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://webtoons.com/id/fantasy/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=1782)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001509)
description.ja:
全世界の人々が3cmに縮んでしまった。それと引き換えに得られた特別な能力。全てが危険連続の世界で頼れるのは自分の能力のみ。

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/3cmlieshou/list?title_no=1497)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001509)
description.pt:
Todos diminuíram para uma altura de 3cm. Agora, mesmo gatos, aranhas, formigas, aspiradores de pó, etc. são calamidades fatais. A única coisa que resta a confiar são as habilidades dadas a cada pessoa.     

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/3cmlieshou/list?title_no=1497)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://webtoons.com/es/action/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=2349)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://webtoons.com/id/fantasy/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=1782)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001509)
description.pt-br: Enquanto procura o lanche favorito de sua irmã, Baekhyeon se vê e as pessoas ao seu redor de repente encolhendo... ao tamanho de formigas! Agora, tudo, de gatos a aspiradores robóticos, representa uma ameaça à sobrevivência humana. Dentro desse caos, todos recebem um presente – uma superpotência e uma interface únicas que permitem que eles vejam dados sobre si mesmos. Embora tenha se tornado um mundo sombrio e desesperado, Baekhyeon deve testar sua habilidade e inteligência para sair vivo e salvar sua irmã.
description.ru:
Люди уменьшились в росте до 3 см. Теперь коты, муравьи, пылесос и другие повседневные предметы стали опасными. Каждый должен полагаться только на свои способности.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/3cmlieshou/list?title_no=1497)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://webtoons.com/es/action/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=2349)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://webtoons.com/id/fantasy/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=1782)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001509)
description.zh:
迷你王子猎手上线
打怪升级，一触即发！
世界发生巨变，全人类都变成了身高只有3cm的迷你人。家猫、昆虫，当那些原本微不足道的存在看起来无比巨大时，你是否会恐慌？你又是否能逃出它们的魔爪，守护自己的家人和朋友？

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/3cmlieshou/list?title_no=1497)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://webtoons.com/es/action/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=2349)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://webtoons.com/id/fantasy/3cm-hunter/list?title_no=1782)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001509)
